bimata pathitha wu minisa sitagaththeya.hethema adi 8k pamana usin wu kala warana dehayak daruweki.rawula saha kondaya digata wawi hadapalu gasi thibuni.dadi balmakin ohu pulathisi desa balamin idiriyata adennata wiya.udukaya wasa kisiwak handa nositi ohuge sawisampanna bahu urathalaya saha papuwa dadi kalu pahayen dilisuni.keti andumakin yatikaya wasa siti athara ek athakin mannayak tharam palalin yuthu kaduwak dara sitiyeya.daruwa wimathiyen balasiti muth kagasuwe natha.me athara eka warama dedena atharata agoris panneya.inpasu thamanta hakithak handa mrudu kara aadarayen kuda pulathisiwa amathiya.

ee sandaha rajya aushadha nishpadana nithigatha sansthawa, aushadha nishpadana karmana shala kihipayak samaga giwisum athsan kara athi bawa da amathiwaraya pawasayi. 2018 wasara wana wita karmantha shala 10k merata aushadha nishpadanaya kirimata salasum kara athi bawathaushadha nishpadana wideshiya welendapolata da apanayanaya kara shri lankawa dakunu aasiyawe aushadha nishpadanaye kendrasthanaya bawata path kirimata balaporoththu wana bawath saukhya amathiwaraya awadharanaya kaleya.
